original_title: The Panic Is On: The Great American Depression as Seen by the Common Man
overview: A stunning collection of photographs, newsreel and vintage documentary footage, era-specific pop music, and mesmerizing eyewitness accounts make for a palpable time capsule of the Great Depression of 1929. -  Pablo Abeita, Connee Boswell, Martha Boswell
title: The Panic Is On: The Great American Depression as Seen by the Common Man
